abstract: Jason Shelowitz, a graphic designer and artist, has been posting his street signs across the city under the guise of the "Metropolitan Etiquette Authority."
snippet: Jason Shelowitz, a graphic designer and artist, has been posting his street signs across the city under the guise of the "Metropolitan Etiquette Authority."
lead_paragraph: Jason Shelowitz has made it his mission to educate New Yorkers on proper urban decorum. All he had to do was break the law. Seventy times.

headline.main: One Outlaw's Campaign for Urban Decorum
